quotes.quote: Everything you do is triggered by an emotion of either desire or fear.
We still seem to trigger that intensity in people, which was quite incredible.
Genetics loads the gun, lifestyle pulls the trigger.
Just like the first breath of life, any engine must be triggered in order to turn it on.
One always pulls the trigger out of self-interest and quotes history to avoid responsibility or pangs of conscience.
Ideas pull the trigger, but instinct loads the gun.
Triggers can happen when you least expect them. When you think all the emotional wounds are healed something can happen that emonds you there is still a scar.
New facts often trigger new ideas.
The people who trigger us to feel negative emotion are messengers. They are messengers for the unhealed parts of our being.
The best ideas will eat at you for days, maybe even weeks, until something, some incident, some impulse, triggers you to finally express them.
Guns require a finger to pull the trigger.
Passion is the trigger for success.

If you're not gonna pull the trigger, don't point the gun.

Know your goal, make a plan and pull the trigger.
Always wait for the trigger. The trigger is the final part of the puzzle, the reason you want to shoot.
Be sure you positively identify your target before you pull the trigger.

Our inner beliefs trigger failure before it happens. They sabotage lasting change by canceling its possibility. We employ these beliefs as articles of faith to justify our inaction and then wish away the result. I call them belief triggers
